directions: In a large bowl combine the chicken, celery and pasta and toss together. In a separate large bowl, combine the mayonnaise, lemon juice and dill weed and mix well, then stir in buttermilk.
Add lemon dill mixture to chicken mixture and toss to coat. Cover bowl, chill for 20 minutes, and serve.
ingredients: 20 pounds skinless, boneless chicken breast halves, cooked and cut into bite-sized pieces
title: Dill Lemon Chicken Pasta Salad
